nodes.bodyText: You need to also change the extension name in the sentence above: "First, you need to include the quarkus-jsonb extension".

 ----

     <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
-    <artifactId>quarkus-jsonb</artifactId>
+    <artifactId>quarkus-resteasy-jsonb</artifactId>
